snippet.title: Everything is Fine (Let's Play)
snippet.description:
Everything is Fine is an interactive story that uses its game mechanics only to tell you about the consequences of alcohol addiction and the connections that can push someone to fight it.

You will see the unstable life of a divorced man with an addiction: watch the difficulties caused by his condition and help him with everyday things, acquiring new forms for him.

https://dreamtalegames.itch.io/everything-is-fine
